column1: 821113,Earthmoving Labourer,,"Operate heavy-duty construction or installation equipment
column3: Operate equipment or vehicles to clear construction sites or move materials

column11: Receive information or instructions for performing work assignments
column13: Assist skilled construction or mining staff
column17: Compact or smooth materials to create level bases
column19: Remove debris or vegetation from work sites
column21: Locate equipment or materials in need of repair or replacement
column27: Signal equipment operators to indicate proper equipment positioning
column35: Spread concrete or other aggregate mixtures
column37: Monitor work areas or procedures to ensure compliance with safety procedures
column39: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
